results.title: Midnite spares
results.creator_credit: Filmco, Tom Burstall and Quentin Masters
results.brief_description: A group of criminals strip cars for their parts and are involved in a kidnapping. When the man’s son returns home after a long absence, he embarks on a chaotic rescue mission with the help of a few friends. Stars James Laurie, Gia Carides, Max Cullen and Bruce Spence.

results.title: Midnight song = Ye ban ge sheng
results.creator_credit: Shanghai Film Studio and Yang Yanjin
results.brief_description:
This is the Chinese version of the Phantom of the Opera. Sun Xiao’ou and Lü Die heard that the local theatre was haunted by a ghost as their performance troupe arrived in the small city. One night they saw a crazy young lady in the theatre. The young lady looked very distressful and asked Xiao’ou to take her away to another place. Xiao’ou learns from the young lady’s nanny that the lady, Li Xiaoxia, is actually the daughter of a rich local businessman. Xiaoxia fell in love with a handsome actor, Song Danping, a few years ago but the proposed marriage was strongly opposed by Xiaoxia’s father, who asked Xiaoxia’s cousin, Tang to murder Xiaoxia’s lover, Song. Song escaped Tang’s murder but was disfigured by vitriol. Song committed suicide by drowning himself in a river and everybody believed he was dead. Song’s death drove Xiaoxia mad, but in fact Song didn’t die. Xiao’ou felt so sorrowful for the couple and one day he ran across Song, who passed him a script, asking Xiao’ou to sing the opera for him and save Xiaoxia. Xiao’ou singing awakes Xiaoxia, who learns that Song is still alive. Song refuses to see Xiaoxia as his face is completely distorted and covered by a mask. Xiaoxia blinds her eyes in order to be with Song. Now Xiaoxia is blind, Tang wants to get Xiao’ou’s girlfriend, Lü Die. However, Tang killed Lü Die accidentally before Song turns up to save her. Tang escaped and incited the crowds to kill the “ghost”, Song. Xiaoxia and Song escaped to a pagoda in the dark night and the crowds burnt the pagoda. The lovers are finally together and died in the fire.

Midnight Song has different film versions and has been adapted to a TV series in Hong Kong. The earliest version is the 1937 one directed by Maxu Weibang. In 1995, the story is re-interpreted by Hong Kong director, Yu Rentai (also known as Ronny Yu). The 1995 version, The Phantom Lover, stars Hong Kong pop singer Leslie Cheung, who played in Farewell My Concubine. (4 stars - Yuxing Zhou; May 21, 2010)

results.brief_description: Short comedy film starring Abbott and Costello who play two car mechanics at a racecourse. Includes a chaotic car chase.

results.title: Middlemarch
results.creator_credit: BBC, Louis Marks and Anthony Page
results.brief_description: George Eliot’s veritable feast of literary delight, with a star studded cast and stunning locations. Early nineteenth century England is restless. Soon the Industrial Revolution will split its population apart - into two opposing factions: the conservatives and the liberals. The young ambitious Doctor Tertius Lydgate arrives in the town of Middlemarch to take up his new position as the local doctor and medical supervisor at the new hospital, his intention is “to do good small work for Middlemarch and great work for the world.” However he meets with resistance from many of the town’s dignitaries. Meanwhile Dorothea Brooke, ashamed of her privileged existence of comfort in her Uncle Arthur’s house, seeks a purpose to her young life and finds herself drawn to the scholarly Edward Casaubon. But on their honeymoon in Rome, it seems her blind faith may have been misplaced… And what of Casubon’s errant artist/writer nephew, the Byronic Will Ladislaw, who is unable to banish Dorothea from his thoughts? He waits in the wings for passion to take its course .

results.title: Middle East: journey into the future
results.brief_description: Depicts the dual life style of Taufic, an Egyptian farmer who, in order to support his family, must leave his village for two weeks in every four and work four hundred miles away as adviser for an oil company. Notes the stresses of the constant change of his life style and the necessity of the work to help the Middle East move into the future.

results.title: Middle distance running; hurdling; the sprint
results.creator_credit: Queensland. Dept. of Education, Alan Smith and Brian Clarkson
results.brief_description: Middle-distance running” is designed to motivate the young to run, with emphasis on a training program that won’t burn the young athlete out. “Hurdling’ and “The Sprint” present a guide to correct technique, and training routines designed to reinforce these skills.

results.title: Midas [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Isabel Perez and Niki Bern
results.brief_description: The classic children’s story of King Midas is retold from the perspective of an adult narrator, with live action and special effects set against a fantastic picture book background. The narrator gets to the heart of the story, revealing the practicalities and dark undertones of being the man with the golden touch. Cast includes Jason Chatwin (King Midas) and Hanna Colles (the Princess).

results.title: Microwave Cooking
results.brief_description: Barbara Harris, author of “Let’s cook microwave” shares her comprehensive knowledge of microwave cookery. Learn about carry-over cooking, defrosting and shielding, how to determine cooking times and other useful tips. In the latter part of the video Barbara demonstrates delicious homemade meals that can be made in minutes.

results.title: Microsurgical replantation
results.brief_description: Focuses on microsurgery and the successful “replantation” of fingers and toes with full use and feelings. This program also explains the problems associated with finding the necessary parts (including veins) that are needed for a successful operation. Finally emphasis is made on the need for continued research in the area of microsurgery. Contains some graphic images.
